originalText.text: Luis and his team are absolutely amazing! They gave me competitive pricing for a whole house new HVAC installation. I had them install  11 new Samsung split units throughout my home. From the time they started Luis made sure he communicated the entire process and visited the site often for quality checks. My biggest fear was sloppiness and mess that contractors leave behind. But Luis and his team cleaned up at the end of the day and made sure there was no trash left behind on my property once the project was completed. This was project was completed in September 2022 and I wanted to wait to write this review. I can say confidently that since the completion Luis has still answered my calls for follow ups and addressed all my concerns and questions until today. They have exceeded my expectations and I would highly recommend them to EVERYONE for their HVAC needs. You will not be disappointed with their services and work ethic. Thank you to Luis and the entire Dezier Air team for making sure this was a painless process for me!

originalText.text:
Dezier Air came in and completely replaced our old system that was no longer working. We tried a few other contractors to get it fixed but none of them could really diagnose what was wrong and kept trying quick fixes that all failed. Dezier Air checked it out, gave us an explanation about what was wrong, gave us a few options, and we opted for a new system so we could make sure it was done right.

Our energy bills went down, we have a higher capacity system, a warranty, and everything is connected via WiFi so we can monitor and control the system from anywhere.

I highly recommend Dezier Air and I'm very happy to have done business with them.

originalText.text: Dezier Air has been my go-to company for all of my maintenance needs. They have always been punctual, professional, and accommodating. I have had several projects completed with them and I am always impressed with the quality of their work. Dezier Air is reliable and trustworthy and I have never had any issues or complaints about their services and highly recommended!

originalText.text: I recently had the pleasure of working with Dezier Air on a renovation project. The workers were extremely professional and communicated well. They took their time to explain the process and answered any questions I had. All in all, I'm very impressed with Dezier Air's services and would highly recommend them for any home projects!

originalText.text: I use Dezier Air LLC at several of the properties that I manage, they are professional, client friendly and efficient in their work. When I have a problem with either heating or cooling in my HVAC systems Dezier Air responds quickly and resolves the issues immediately. Their resources in obtaining parts is also impressive in these times of supply chain delays, overall I am very pleased with their service.
